news_header: A kayaker was briefly trapped in the mouth of a humpback whale off the coast of Chile, but was released unharmed. In Brazil, a factory fire injured at least 20 people and caused two fatalities.
news_original_title: Watch moment man is swallowed by humpback whale
news_text: Heavy rains led to flooding and chaos in transport. In Guatemala, a firefighter dressed as Santa delivered gifts, while unrest in Peru resulted in seven deaths. A man was detained in Lima for attempting to smuggle endangered species. Evo Morales claimed an assassination attempt, and a former One Direction star died in Argentina.
